languages.text: "Нет, Ваша Светлость. Мы с Рэндором всегда были крепки в вере, и благоговели перед служением ткачей, но их священный путь был слишком темным и пугающим для нас".

traits.locale_text: "Нет, Ваша Светлость. Мы с Рэндором всегда были крепки в вере, и благоговели перед служением ткачей, но их священный путь был слишком темным и пугающим для нас".

languages.text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Randor and I, we have always been stalwart in our faith, and we revered the spinners' service, but their sacred path was too dark and frightening for us."
languages.original_text: "Нет, Ваша Светлость. Мы с Рэндором всегда были крепки в вере, и благоговели перед служением ткачей, но их священный путь был слишком темным и пугающим для нас".

traits.locale_text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Randor and I, we have always been stalwart in our faith, and we revered the spinners' service, but their sacred path was too dark and frightening for us."
"Oh yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. It was through serving the Undying One that Randor and I found ourselves... and each other."
"No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Randor and I, we have always been stalwart in our faith, and we revered the spinners' service, but their sacred path was too dark and frightening for us."
"Oh, yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. It was through serving the Undying One that Randor and I found ourselves... and each other."
"No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Randor and I, we have always been stalwart in our faith, and we revered the spinners' service, but their sacred path was too dark and frightening for us."
"No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Randor and I, we have always been stalwart in our faith, and we revered the spinners' service, but their sacred path was too dark and frightening for us."
"No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Randor and I, we have always been stalwart in our faith, and we revered the spinners' service, but their sacred path was too dark and frightening for us."
"No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Randor and I, we have always been stalwart in our faith, and we revered the spinners' service, but their sacred path was too dark and frightening for us."

languages.text: « Non, Votre Seigneurie. Randor et moi avons toujours été de fidèles croyants, et nous tenions les bons offices des tisseurs en haute estime, mais leur voie sacrée s'est avérée trop sombre et effrayante à notre goût. »
languages.original_text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Randor and I, we have always been stalwart in our faith, and we revered the spinners' service, but their sacred path was too dark and frightening for us."

traits.locale_text: « Non, Votre Seigneurie. Randor et moi avons toujours été de fidèles croyants, et nous tenions les bons offices des tisseurs en haute estime, mais leur voie sacrée s'est avérée trop sombre et effrayante à notre goût. »

languages.text: «No, mil{mf|ord|ady}. Randor y yo siempre hemos tenido una fe ciega mientras estábamos al servicio de lasos tejedores, pero su sagrado sendero nos ha resultado demasiado oscuro y aterrador».
languages.original_text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Randor and I, we have always been stalwart in our faith, and we revered the spinners' service, but their sacred path was too dark and frightening for us."

traits.locale_text: «No, mil{mf|ord|ady}. Randor y yo siempre hemos tenido una fe ciega mientras estábamos al servicio de lasos tejedores, pero su sagrado sendero nos ha resultado demasiado oscuro y aterrador».

languages.text: 「いいえ、陛下。ランドールと私は、常に信仰を堅持し、織り手の奉仕を敬愛してきましたが、彼らの神聖な道は、私たちにはあまりにも暗く、恐ろしいものでした」
languages.original_text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Randor and I, we have always been stalwart in our faith, and we revered the spinners' service, but their sacred path was too dark and frightening for us."

traits.locale_text: 「いいえ、陛下。ランドールと私は、常に信仰を堅持し、織り手の奉仕を敬愛してきましたが、彼らの神聖な道は、私たちにはあまりにも暗く、恐ろしいものでした」

languages.text: “并非如此，大人。我和兰德尔一直恪守着我们的信仰，我们也尊重织网者的侍奉，但对我们而言，他们神圣的道路实在是过于阴森、过于恐怖。”
languages.original_text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Randor and I, we have always been stalwart in our faith, and we revered the spinners' service, but their sacred path was too dark and frightening for us."

traits.locale_text: “并非如此，大人。我和兰德尔一直恪守着我们的信仰，我们也尊重织网者的侍奉，但对我们而言，他们神圣的道路实在是过于阴森、过于恐怖。”

languages.text: Nein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Randor und ich waren stets fest in unserem Glauben und wir haben den Dienst der Spinner verehrt, aber ihr Weg war für uns zu dunkel und erschreckend.
languages.original_text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Randor and I, we have always been stalwart in our faith, and we revered the spinners' service, but their sacred path was too dark and frightening for us."

traits.locale_text: Nein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Randor und ich waren stets fest in unserem Glauben und wir haben den Dienst der Spinner verehrt, aber ihr Weg war für uns zu dunkel und erschreckend.

languages.text: "Hayır {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Randor ile ben, her daim inancımıza sadık kaldık ve dokurların hizmetine hürmet ettik. Fakat onların kutsal yolları, bizim için çok karanlık ve ürkütücüydü."
languages.original_text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Randor and I, we have always been stalwart in our faith, and we revered the spinners' service, but their sacred path was too dark and frightening for us."
